metadata.description: Plant watering configuration for automated reminders

plants.name: Ivy Geranium (Balcony)
plants.location: Outdoor balcony with full sun to partial shade
plants.care_notes: Thrives in bright, direct sunlight and well-draining soil. Allow the top layer of soil to dry slightly between waterings. Deadhead spent flowers to promote continuous blooming; pinch back leggy stems; protect from frost.

plants.name: Peacock Plant (Indoor)
plants.location: Bright, indirect light indoors with high humidity
plants.care_notes: Keep soil evenly moist but not waterlogged; use filtered or rainwater to prevent leaf tip browning; maintain humidity above 60%; avoid direct sun; dust leaves regularly to promote healthy photosynthesis.

plants.name: Dragon Tree (Indoor Corner)
plants.location: Bright, indirect light indoors; avoid drafts
plants.care_notes: Use well-draining soil; allow top 2-3 cm of soil to dry between waterings; avoid waterlogged conditions to prevent root rot; maintain moderate humidity; wipe leaves to remove dust; rotate periodically for even growth; feed lightly during active season.

plants.name: Flaming Katy (Indoor Window)
plants.location: Bright, indirect light indoors near a window
plants.care_notes: Use a well-draining succulent mix; allow the top 2-3 cm of soil to dry out between waterings; provide bright light or filtered sun; remove spent blooms to encourage new flowering; feed monthly with diluted balanced fertilizer; keep temperatures between 15-24 Â°C.

plants.name: Spider Plant (Indoor Table)
plants.care_notes: Use well-draining potting mix; allow the top 2 cm of soil to dry between waterings; maintain moderate humidity; trim any brown leaf tips; rotate pot periodically for even growth; remove and propagate plantlets to encourage fuller foliage.

plants.name: Tree Aeonium (Shelf)
plants.location: Bright, indirect light indoors or sunny windowsill
plants.care_notes: Plant in a well-draining succulent mix; allow soil to dry out completely between waterings; provide bright light and avoid cold drafts; remove spent rosettes at stem base; repot when rootbound.
